reviews.review: I Have Seen This Movie Last Night, and so Awesome, All in, Fun, Action, Comedy, Drama, but the film ending feel not complete because no one win, all have lost
I am still shaking uncontrollably. It was everything I expected and nothing like I expected.

Avengers Infinty War exceeded my expectations. I feared the amalgamation of so many strong characters would be overwhelming and chaotic, but it was not so. The film was powerful, engaging, charismatic, shocking, and impactful. How so much development could be achieved in such a short run time is truly a marvel.

Packed with action and laughs, as you would expect from any great marvel film. Highly anticipated and wasn't let down in the least.  Cheering from the crowded room at big moments makes me feel that my fellow movie goers weren't disappointed, either. The ending moments were haunting and almost breathtaking... maybe even tear jerking. Somewhat expected, yet unexpected at the same time. I'm not sure if that makes any sense, but it's the truth. A battle of the ages and I can't wait to see it again when the crowd dies down next week.
Am done with comic book movies after this fiasco. Sad through and through. Time to get back to making REAL movies.

Just came from watching this amazing Film.....Kevin Feige & Russo brothers are not playing around they held no punches...your seriously doing yourself an injustice by not seeing this film...to sum it up as best as I can it was an emotional, non-stop, pound for pound action, rollercoaster, with Oh Sh*T moments galore...as a avid comicbook fan in general..I don't know how you guys (all the actors & directors involved) pulled this off honestly...I don't, but you know a film is on point, when you hear the crowd in the theater gasping, crying, yelling in anger, laughing, clapping, cheering that experience alone was truly worth it...and one of the reasons why I'll be going back again tomorrow, Saturday, and Sunday...thank you to all the actors, thank you Russo brothers and thank you Mr.Kevin Feige and thank you Mr.Stan Lee...everything we just experience was just amazing...two words for you.....MIND BLOWN! And please please UP THE DATE ON AVENGERS 4 cause us fans need it!

An absolute roller coaster of a movie. I laughed, I cried, I felt every possible emotion. Go see Infinity War. Easily an 8.7 with one of the best super hero villains known to date. Absolutely amazing.
Simply amazing if you're a Marvel fan. The CGI is close to perfect.
Loving the film from beginning to its unexpected and shocking ending <3
The best movie on decade! speechless!
